title: Robinhood’s Stock Drops 12% After Loss Is Worse Than Analysts Expected
sub_head: Higher technology and administrative costs hurt the brokerage’s fourth-quarter results
body:
Robinhood Markets Inc.’s stock fell 12% in postmarket trading after the brokerage reported a loss of $423 million for the fourth quarter.
The company had an increase in technology and administrative expenses that ate into its results.
